functional_units.name: FilesystemAccessAuditEvent
functional_units.description: Structured audit event emitted for each filesystem access operation, containing hashed path identifiers and timestamped data.

functional_units.name: FilesystemAccessAuditTrail
functional_units.description: Rotating log store that records all FilesystemAccessAuditEvents with bounded rotation and redacted metadata.

functional_units.name: FilesystemAccessLogger
functional_units.description: Component responsible for formatting audit logs in ISO 8601 timestamps, sanitizing error metadata, and writing events to the audit trail.

functional_units.name: FilesystemAccess
functional_units.description: Core filesystem access module that emits structured audit events for open, save, and bookmark flows while preserving hashed path identifiers.

functional_units.name: CLI Bookmark Flow Integration
functional_units.description: Command-line interface flow that consumes FilesystemAccessAuditTrail events once zero-trust telemetry flags are enabled.
